channel.title: gender equality on Stephany Nusch
channel.description: Recent content in gender equality on Stephany Nusch

item.title: How self-awareness helped my career development
item.description: The fact that I’d end up working in tech came as no surprise to me nor to anyone who knew me. I’ve always been curious and enthusiastic about the infinite possibilities that a computer or video game presented. To create and learn is what moves me and, for sure, is what brought me here. However, I was definitely not ready for all the obstacles waiting for me in this journey.

item.title: Book Review: Brotopia — Breaking up the Boys' Club of Silicon Valley
item.description: Brotopia - Breaking up the Boys’ Club of Silicon Valley From video games to spaceships, technology’s played a big role in modern society. Powerful men leading the movement are often celebrated and recognized as the face of the tech industry. However, have you ever asked yourself why almost no women make it to the headlines? Being a female Software Engineer myself, I struggled a lot with the stereotype that was expected from me.
